vulnerability_description: The AWS host is configured as a proxy which allows access to the metadata service. This could allow significant access to the host/infrastructure.
vulnerability_remediation: Disable the proxy or restrict configuration to only allow access to approved hosts/ports. Upgrade to IMDSv2 if possible.
impact: For security reasons, this service can generally only be accessed via the localhost. Upon a server compromise or SSRF vulnerability, however, this service can be accessible to attackers
